name: AI Transform
semantic_context: Modify data based on instructions written in plain english
natural_language_description: 这是 AI Transform 节点。主要用于: Modify data based on instructions written in plain english

instructions.name: instructions
instructions.description: Provide instructions on how you want to transform the data, then click 'Generate code'. Use dot notation to refer to nested fields (e.g. address.street).
instructions.natural_language_description: 参数名: Instructions | 作用: Provide instructions on how you want to transform the data, then click 'Generate code'. Use dot notation to refer to nested fields (e.g. address.street).

codeGeneratedForPrompt.name: codeGeneratedForPrompt
codeGeneratedForPrompt.natural_language_description: 参数名: Code Generated For Prompt

jsCode.name: jsCode
jsCode.natural_language_description: 参数名: Generated JavaScript | 提示: Read-only. To edit this code, adjust the instructions or copy and paste it into a Code node.
